title: Privacy Policy
description: This Privacy Policy explains how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit or interact with this website.

informationWeCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
items: When you visit this website, certain non-personal information is automatically collected, such as your browser type, IP address, and pages visited.
If you contact me through the website, I may collect your name, email address, and any other information you provide.

howWeUseYourInformation.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
items: To improve the website and enhance user experience.
To respond to inquiries and provide support.
To analyze website traffic and trends.

sharingOfInformation.title: 3. Sharing of Information
items: I do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties.
Certain analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics) may collect aggregated data for performance monitoring.

cookiesAndTrackingTechnologies.title: 4. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookiesAndTrackingTechnologies.text: This website may use cookies to enhance user experience. You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings.

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.text: Reasonable measures are taken to protect your data, but no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

changesToPolicy.title: 6. Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.text: I may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected on this page.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.text: If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact me via the email provided on the website.
